sub-events.comment: This is the speed new monsters are spawned at, and the player score.

action.name: Add key
action.param: "We have received your alarm. Does your coffee-machine not work?"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "We received data. You're in Russia. I hope it's not cold there."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Smith, we are trying to determine your location. We'll save you."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mike from Typing Department asks you to take a picture of a bear."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mr. Smith, don't panic. Obviously, you're somewhere in Syberia."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "We are trying to determine coordinates of your location."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "We have some good news. It's easy to get firewood in Syberia."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Your situation isn't so poor. You have an unscheduled vacation!"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Good morning, Mr. Smith. Your wife, Lucy, sends you greetings."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Hey, Mr. Smith! The resque team will get to you soon!"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Hello, Syberia! Hope you are in a good mood."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "There is no news for today. So I'll just set you a merry tune."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Resque team has to make an emergency stop to get warm by vodka."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Congratulations with the first day of summer! Yippee!"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Resque team is coming. They'll catch you in few minutes."

sub-events.comment: Always look the player towards the mouse, and update the status text.
